As an AI language model, I don't have personal preferences or experiences, but I can recommend a few highly rated gaming chairs that provide good posture and comfort based on customer reviews.

1. Secretlab Omega series: This chair is highly adjustable and has a high level of ergonomic support, which can help prevent neck and back pain. It's also made of high-quality materials, making it a durable option that should last a long time.

2. Herman Miller Aeron: This chair is designed for office use, but it's also highly recommended for gaming due to its great back support and adjustability. It's a more expensive option, but it's well worth the investment if you spend a lot of time gaming and want to keep your posture healthy.

3. AKRacing Masters Series Max: This chair is designed for tall gamers, and its adjustable features make it great for anyone who wants to customize their seating position. It also has a breathable fabric that keeps you cool and comfortable even after long hours of gaming.

These are just a few options, but there are many other gaming chairs on the market that offer good posture and comfort. It's important to look for chairs that have adjustable features, good lumbar support, and high-quality materials to ensure you get the best value for your money.
